author: Simon Difford
description: Coconut and rum with a splash of lime are a tried and tested flavour matches. In this case with the added punch of overproof funky Jamaican rum.
name: Coconut Rum Punch

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
